omaDmConfigTlv Struct Reference

This structure will hold the SwiOmaDmConfig session parameters information. More...

#include <qaCbkSwiOmaDmEventReportInd.h>

Data Fields

BYTE state
BYTE userInputReq
USHORT userInputTimeout
USHORT alertmsglength
BYTE alertmsg [256]

Detailed Description

Parameters:
state 
  • 0x01 - OMA-DM Read Request
  • 0x02 - OMA-DM Change Request
  • 0x03 - OMA-DM Config Complete
user_input_req - Bit mask of available user inputs

  • 0x00 - No user input required.Informational indication
  • 0x01 - Accept
  • 0x02 - Reject
user_input_timeout 
  • Timeout for user input in minutes. A value of 0 means no time-out
alertmsglength 
  • Length of Alert message string in bytes
alertmsg 
  • Alert message in UCS2 (Max 256 characters)
